title: Paul Hollywood’s bloomer
description: Fresh from the oven with a sliver of butter melting into it, or the next day as toast with anything from marmalade to pâté spread on top, there’s no beating a homemade white loaf.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white flour, plus extra for kneading
40ml/1½fl oz olive oil, plus extra for kneading
extra oil and flour, for kneading
